article.title: Problem showing document

abstract.para: The Window List enables you to manage the windows that are open on the GNOME Desktop. Each window is represented by a button in the panel in which this applet is located.

article.remark: This file has been created when we migrated the window list docs to the User Guide in March 2007.
One day we should remove it completely, say in a couple of release cyles.

sect1.title: Problem showing document
sect1.para: This document is depreciated, please consult the Window List help in the GNOME User Guide .
Please take the time to report a bug . Select the general component of gnome-user-docs and be sure to indicate how you came upon this depreciated document.
